name: AtomoS
description:
You are playing a little atom with 4 different super abilities. Your destiny is to survive against the other atoms, which are trying to steal yourenergy.

How to play:

You start with 8 Energy Points and you are losing 1 Energy Point every 3 seconds. 

You can change the color of your character when you click on the right mousebutton and activate with the left mousebutton.

  • Red (Speed Boost):
    • Cost: 1 Energy
    • Duration: 3 seconds
  • Green (Enemy Slow):
    • Cost: 2 Energy
    • Duration: 3 seconds
  • Blue (Enemy Freeze):
    • Cost: 3 Energy
    • Duration: 1 seconds
  • Yellow (Destroy all Enemy):
    • Cost: 4 Energy
    • Duration:  none
